1: Move blue triangle B2 and pink circle B1 into SA3.
2: Move green triangle B2 inside special area SA3.
3: Grab pink square B5 with the robot.
4: Move pink square B1 into SA2.
5: Move green triangle B1 into SA3
6: Grab pink triangle B1 with the robot.
7: Push the blocks B1, B2 and B5 closer to SA2.
8: Move blue circle block B2 into SA1.
9: Move green square block B3 into SA1.
10: Turn the robot towards blue circle block B1
